price: Ta-sin. [1] Ovo su ajeti Kur’ana i Knjige jasne,
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ
footnotes: [1] Pogledati značenje spomenuto prilikom tumačenja prvog ajeta sure El-Bekare.

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
